Headline: #3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: NB 3 King Drive & 4 Cottage Grove buses rrtd via Michigan, Roosevelt, State, Washington & Michigan due to police activity near Michigan/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound #3 King Drive and #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Roosevelt, State, Washington, then resume their normal route on Michigan due to police activity near Michigan/Roosevelt.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Michigan/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: EB 12 Roosevelt buses are rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 18th, Indiana, Michigan and Roosevelt due to police activity near Michigan/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Eastbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Michigan, 18th, Indiana, Michigan, then resume their normal route on Roosevelt due to police activity near Michigan/Roosevelt.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
